## GitHub Download Module

GitHub archive download functionality.

Handles downloading release archives from GitHub repositories.

### Interfaces

- [DownloadOptions](github.qmd#symbol-interface-downloadoptions)
- [DownloadResult](github.qmd#symbol-interface-downloadresult)

### Type Aliases

- [DownloadProgressCallback](github.qmd#symbol-typealias-downloadprogresscallback)

- [downloadFromUrl](github.qmd#symbol-function-downloadfromurl)
- [downloadGitHubArchive](github.qmd#symbol-function-downloadgithubarchive)

## GitHub Releases Module

GitHub releases API client.

Provides functions to query and resolve GitHub release versions.

### Interfaces

- [GitHubOptions](github.qmd#symbol-interface-githuboptions)
- [GitHubRelease](github.qmd#symbol-interface-githubrelease)
- [GitHubTag](github.qmd#symbol-interface-githubtag)

- [ResolveVersionOptions](github.qmd#symbol-interface-resolveversionoptions)

### Functions

- [constructArchiveUrl](github.qmd#symbol-function-constructarchiveurl)
- [fetchReleases](github.qmd#symbol-function-fetchreleases)
- [fetchTags](github.qmd#symbol-function-fetchtags)
- [getLatestRelease](github.qmd#symbol-function-getlatestrelease)
- [resolveVersion](github.qmd#symbol-function-resolveversion)
